verses.roman:
tasmin sudhanvann ahani
bhagavān yat samādiśat
upāyād āśrama-padaṁ
muneḥ śānta-vratasya tat

synonyms: tasmin—on that; su-dhanvan—O great bowman Vidura; ahani—on the day; bhagavān—the Lord; yat—which; samādiśat—foretold; upāyāt—he reached; āśrama-padam—the holy hermitage; muneḥ—of the sage; śānta—completed; vratasya—whose vows of austerity; tat—that.
translation: O Vidura, they reached the hermitage of the sage, who had just completed his vows of austerity on the very day foretold by the Lord.
